name: Stileto Makes a Friend
body:
**Source** Alec Ellsworth
-
The fire spirits in Stileto love meeting new people! Though, they don't usually spend enough time with people to establish a safety word before melting their insides and turning them into a fucking bomb.
-
New Friend (A) Requirements Your last action was a successful melee *Playful Strike* and Stileto is not in *Firecracker Form*.
Effect The fire spirits are so excited to meet your target that they all flood the wound made by *Playful Strike*. Your target must make a Fortitude save:
Critical Success Your target takes no damage from *New Friend*.
Success Your target takes 4d6 fire damage.
Failure As success but your target is also propelled by the spirits, knocking the target airborne, landing 25 feet away from you unless they have a fly speed or otherwise forced to stop or change direction. 
Critical Failure As Failure but the damage is increased to 8d6 fire damage.
-
They Were Lame Anyway (R) Requirements The target failed their save and was knocked airborne. 
Trigger The target is at 0 HP or otherwise considered dead after landing on a solid surface.
Effect The triggering target becomes a corpse bomb, instantly gaining the effect of a 3rd-level *Fireball*, saving against your Arcane Spell DC, centered on the square(s) the triggering target has landed in. Instead of calculating the affected squares as a burst, calculate them as an emanation from the body. 

-
Level 13: The level of the *Fireball* in *They Were Lame Anyway* is now a 5th-level *Fireball*. 
-
Level 17: The level of the *Fireball* in *They Were Lame Anyway* is now an 7th-level *Fireball*.
-
Level 20: The level of the *Fireball* in *They Were Lame Anyway* is now a 9th-level *Fireball*.
